detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DiceToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DiceToken.sol#91-202) has payable functions:
	 - DiceToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DiceToken.sol#191-193)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
